mutants.original_line: text = ''.join([c.lower() if c.isalpha() or c.isspace() else ' ' for c in text])
mutants.mutated_line: text = 'MUTATED'.join([c.lower() if c.isalpha() or c.isspace() else ' ' for c in text])

mutants.original_line: return sorted(word_freq.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)
mutants.mutated_line: return sorted(word_freq.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=False)
